snippet.title: Game & Watch - Mickey Mouse (Wide Screen) (c)1981 Nintendo [MAME emulation footage]
snippet.description:
This the Game & Watch Mickey Mouse,  a Wide Screen series Game & Watch unit from Nintendo released in 1981.  Mickey Mouse is identical in terms of code to another Game & Watch release, Egg.  This game was also cloned by 3rd parties under a number of different names, again with the same ROM code.  For the uploads of Mickey Mouse and Egg I'm using the same input replay file, so aside from the visuals the play is identical.

Recent work on Game & Watch emulation has come from Algestam, with earlier work being done by Sean Riddle and hap.  DarthMarino provided the artwork for more recently emulated units, while hydef was generally responsible for the artwork on ones emulated before 2020, links to the artwork are below

https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1vl9O-0jIGCHHY_lrWpOwBtqTXEKsVGOY  DarthMarino 
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1WLKcvynl0ky2mRL1UacA9yaiMTnNs4x5 hydef
